program main

   implicit none

   integer :: n, m, test, sub, count, i, a1, a2, min_val, count_ones, pos

   integer, allocatable :: a(:)

   character(len=1000) :: first_output, x, a_str, b_str, temp_str

   ! First part

   read*, n, m

   allocate(a(m)) if (mod(n, m) ==0) then

      a = n/m

   else

      sub = n/m

      a = sub

      test = n - sub*m

      count =0

      do i=1, test

         a(count+1) = a(count+1) +1

         count = count +1

         if (count > m) then

            count =0

         end if

      end do

   end if

   ! Build first_output string

   first_output = ''

   if (m >0) then

      write(first_output, '(i0)') a(m) do i = m-1, 1, -1

         write(temp_str, '(i0)') a(i) first_output = trim(first_output) // ' ' // trim(temp_str)

      end do

   end if

   ! Second part

   ! Extract first token from first_output

   pos = index(first_output, ' ') if (pos ==0) then

      x = first_output

   else

      x = first_output(1:pos-1)

   end if

   a_str = x

   b_str = x

   a1 =0

   do i=2, len_trim(a_str)

      if (a_str(i:i) == a_str(i-1:i-1)) then

         if (a_str(i:i) == '1') then

            a_str(i:i) = '0'

         else

            a_str(i: i) = '1'

         end if

         a1 = a1 +1

      end if

   end do

   a2 =0

   do i = len_trim(b_str), 2, -1

      if (b_str(i:i) == b_str(i-1:i-1)) then

         if (b_str(i-1:i-1) == '1') then

            b_str(i-1:i-1) = '0'

         else

            b_str(i-1:i-1) = '1'

         end if

         a2 = a2 +1

      end if

   end do

   min_val = min(a1, a2)

   ! Third part

   count_ones =0

   temp = min_val

   do while (temp >0)

      if (mod(temp,2) ==1) then

         count_ones = count_ones +1

      end if

      temp = temp /2

   end do

   print*, count_ones

   deallocate(a)

end program main

program main

   implicit none

   integer :: n, m, test, sub, count, i, a1, a2, min_val, count_ones, pos

   integer, allocatable :: a(:)

   character(len=1000) :: first_output, x, a_str, b_str, temp_str

   ! First part

   read*, n, m

   allocate(a(m))

   if (mod(n, m) ==0) then

      a = n/m

   else

      sub = n/m

      a = sub

      test = n - sub*m

      count =0

      do i=1, test

         a(count+1) = a(count+1) +1

         count = count +1

         if (count > m) then

            count =0

         end if

      end do

   end if

   ! Build first_output string

   first_output = ''

   if (m >0) then

      write(first_output, '(i0)') a(m)

      do i = m-1, 1, -1

         write(temp_str, '(i0)') a(i)

         first_output = trim(first_output) // ' ' // trim(temp_str)

      end do

   end if

   ! Second part

   ! Extract first token from first_output

   pos = index(first_output, ' ')

   if (pos ==0) then

      x = first_output

   else

      x = first_output(1:pos-1)

   end if

   a_str = x

   b_str = x

   a1 =0

   do i=2, len_trim(a_str)

      if (a_str(i:i) == a_str(i-1:i-1)) then

         if (a_str(i:i) == '1') then

            a_str(i:i) = '0'

         else

            a_str(i:i) = '1'

         end if

         a1 = a1 +1

      end if

   end do

   a2 =0

   do i = len_trim(b_str), 2, -1

      if (b_str(i:i) == b_str(i-1:i-1)) then

         if (b_str(i-1:i-1) == '1') then

            b_str(i-1:i-1) = '0'

         else

            b_str(i-1:i-1) = '1'

         end if

         a2 = a2 +1

      end if

   end do

   min_val = min(a1, a2)

   ! Third part

   count_ones =0

   temp = min_val

   do while (temp >0)

      if (mod(temp,2) ==1) then

         count_ones = count_ones +1

      end if

      temp = temp /2

   end do

   print*, count_ones

   deallocate(a)

end program main
